column4: this is my /var/spool/cron/crontabs/chasetoys file... permissions:  -rw-r----- 2 root lp 55812 2008-11-01 17:19 chasetoys.  when i try: : crontab -e  =>  crontabs/chasetoys: Permission denied  ... when i'm currently logged in as chasetoys.  so is it as simple matter of changing owner to chasetoys ?
probably. mine is owned by my user
i have no idea. i don't recall setting those permissions myself
